long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Dose of Mental Maths

"Daily Dose of Mental Maths" is an educational Chrome extension designed to help users improve their mental math skills through engaging and interactive exercises. Whether you're looking to sharpen your addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division skills, this extension offers a variety of difficulty levels to challenge and enhance your mathematical abilities.

Features:

Personalized Experience: Enter your name to personalize your learning journey.
Progress Tracking: Track your progress with a visual progress bar and level system.
Multiple Difficulty Levels: Choose from easy, medium, or hard difficulty levels to match your skill level.
Interactive Exercises: Solve math problems within a time limit to earn points and XP.
Level Up: Gain XP and level up as you improve your skills.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for a seamless learning experience.
How to Use:

Enter your name to get started.
Select the type of math exercise you want to practice (addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division).
Choose your desired difficulty level.
Solve the math problems within the given time limit.
Track your progress and level up as you earn XP.
Enhance your mental math skills with "Daily Dose of Mental Maths" and make learning math fun and interactive!
